experiment.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis stem, leaf and hypocotyl tissue undergoing varying amounts of secondary cell wall synthesis

description.text: The aim of this experiment was to understand secondary cell wall formation as it is a major constituent of wood and plant fibres. To identify potential novel genes involved in this process, data has been generated from Arabidopsis stem, leaf and hypocotyl tissue undergoing varying amounts of secondary cell wall synthesis.

bibliography.authors: David Ray, Lisa Rice, Charlotte Waters, Jennifer Eccles, Helen Garside, Paula Sommer, Paul Kay, Fiona Blackhall, Leo Zeef, Brian Telfer, Ian Stratford, Robert Clarke, Dave Singh, Anne White, and Adam Stevens
bibliography.title: Identification, and functional analysis of Ska2 interaction with the glucocorticoid receptor

bibliography.authors: Brown DM, Zeef LA, Ellis J, Goodacre R, Turner SR
bibliography.title: Identification of novel genes in Arabidopsis involved in secondary cell wall formation using expression profiling and reverse genetics
